Description.Details: The king of the battlefield in terms of raw damage, AC/20s hit harder than any other weapon. However, this comes at the expense of weight, range, and severely limited ammunition. This AC/20 suffers from <color=#dd7e6b> -1 Recoil/refire penalty </color>, when continuously fired. Your pilots guts skill can counteract this. Additionally, <color=#f79924>AC20s have a damage variance of +/- 10 points of damage.</color>
